sentences.en: Addition of the shortstop causes the emulsion to break.
sentences.cn: 中止液的加入引起乳液破坏.

sentences.en: After cooling, the emulsion flows into a centrifuge.
sentences.cn: 冷却后, 乳状液流入离心分离机.

sentences.en: Centrifuging, washing, and filtering may separate any fraction of polymer that occurred by an emulsion process.
sentences.cn: 离心, 洗涤, 和过滤可以分离乳液法制得的任何级分的聚合物.

sentences.en: Choice of stabilizer in emulsion systems has always been rather empirical.
sentences.cn: 在乳液体系中,稳定剂的选择往往凭经验.

sentences.en: Immediately after an emulsion is coated onto its film or glass base it begins to age.
sentences.cn: 乳胶涂到软片或玻璃板上之后老化过程即开始.

sentences.en: Imperfect transmission is the glass or film upon which the emulsion is coated.
sentences.cn: 涂乳胶的玻璃片或软片不完全透明.

sentences.en: It is the good stabilizer of photosensitive resin, sensitive emulsion, synthetic resin.
sentences.cn: 是光敏树脂 、 感光乳剂 、 合成树脂的良好稳定剂.

sentences.en: Most polymer emulsion may coagulate when they enter waste streams.
sentences.cn: 多数聚合物乳浊液在进入废水流时可能凝聚.

sentences.en: Once the paint is dry, apply a coat of the red ochre emulsion paint.
sentences.cn: 油漆干了后，涂一层发红的土黄色乳胶漆。

sentences.en: Spectroscopic emulsion should be stored in a dry, oxygen - free environment.
sentences.cn: 光谱测量用的乳胶应贮存在干燥 、 无氧的环境中.

sentences.en: The behaviour of an exposed and processed emulsion is very sensitive to a number of factors.
sentences.cn: 曝光和冲洗后的乳胶性能对许多因素非常敏感.

sentences.en: The output signal from the detector may be the blackening of a photographic emulsion.
sentences.cn: 探测器的输出信号可以是照相乳胶的黑度.

sentences.en: The photographic elements contain a blue - sensitive hydrophilic colloid silver halide emulsion layer.
sentences.cn: 照像材料含有亲水胶体的感蓝卤化银卤剂层.

sentences.en: The proof is recoated with dichromate emulsion.
sentences.cn: 将这张校样重新涂以重铬酸盐乳剂.

sentences.en: The self - crosslinking acrylate printing adhesive was synthesized by emulsion polymerization.
sentences.cn: 采用乳液聚合法合成自 交联型 丙烯酸酯类印花粘合剂.

trans.tran_cn: 乳状液，感光乳剂，[药]乳剂，乳胶漆
trans.tran_en: a mixture of liquids that do not completely combine, such as oil and water
